package.name: Components
package.summary: A package for dealing with Horde components
package.description: The package provides utility methods required when preparing a new component release for Horde. It also includes quality control checks.
package.notes: * [jan] Use new version name scheme, matching PEAR's. * [gwr] Replaced use of PEAR_PackageFileManager for updating package.xml with Horde_Pear. * [gwr] Better help display for context modules. * [gwr] Extracted the .gitignore handling for content lists to the Horde_Pear packages. * [gwr] Fix appending the snapshot date for pre-releases. * [gwr] Allow to keep the version when generating snapshots. * [gwr] Accept an empty initial note.

release.notes: * [jan] Use new version name scheme, matching PEAR's. * [gwr] Replaced use of PEAR_PackageFileManager for updating package.xml with Horde_Pear. * [gwr] Better help display for context modules. * [gwr] Extracted the .gitignore handling for content lists to the Horde_Pear packages. * [gwr] Fix appending the snapshot date for pre-releases. * [gwr] Allow to keep the version when generating snapshots. * [gwr] Accept an empty initial note.
